articles.description: Revenue from operations came in at ₹29,866 crore during the period under review as against ₹26,517 crore in corresponding of last year.
articles.content: Telecom major Bharti Airtel Ltd consolidated net profit surged 22% to 1,650 crore for the third quarter ended 31 December, 2021. It was 1,350 crore in the year-ago period.
